name: One Day Mower
description:
One Day Mower

Follow the career of Aunt Nancy's Advanced Landscaping newest intern. Learn the ropes and become a full time employee if you have the skill!

Made in 3 days for the Minimalism Jam by r/SoloDevelopment

NOTE: This is just a single prototype level made for the the jam, in the future I have plans to add more levels and a story.

Controls / Gameplay

Use the mower to clear a certain percentage of grass before the time runs out.

  • WASD / Arrow Keys to drive the mower
  • C toggles between camera modes
Known Issues
  • WebGL version looks way off on colors and may have performance issues, recommend the desktop version if so inclined.
Attribution
  • Models designed by me
  • Font is "Dogica" by rmocci
